mapper.select: SELECT p.*, TO_CHAR(p.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_at_formatted, u.nickname as author_nickname FROM post p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.author = u.user_id WHERE p.board_id = #{board_id};
SELECT p.*, TO_CHAR(p.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_at_formatted, u.nickname as author_nickname FROM post p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.author = u.user_id WHERE p.post_id = #{post_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (title, author, content, board_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{author}, #{content}, #{board_id}, NOW(), NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, board_id = #{board_id}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE post_id = #{post_id};
